name: ali hat
notes:
--------------------------------------------------
one of my favourite stitches for showing off gorgeous yarns - you can use dk, aran or worsted weight, but be sure to check your gauge. 

works for guys or gals (both alistair and alexandra have one in my family - hence the name )

tip - if you want to turn up a cuff and have the same stitches showing, the easiest way is to work a wrap and turn. 
that way you keep working the same way but the stitches are reversed.


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/discuss/stitchnerds/3752587/1-25#1
